item.title: Amazon retire 40 % de son prix à ce chargeur 2-en-1 compatible MagSafe et Qi2
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5"> div>Ugreen propose de nombreux accessoires pour téléphone, et quelques produits qui sortent du lot comme ce chargeur à induction 2-en-1 certifié Qi2 et MagSafe dont le prix passe de 39 euros à 23 euros seulement sur Amazon./div> /div>]]> ]]>

item.title: Quelles sont les nouveautés d’iOS 26.2, la future mise à jour de l’iPhone ?
CVE-2025-14258 A vulnerability has been found in itsourcecode Student Management System 1.0. Affected by this vulne...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[A vulnerability has been found in itsourcecode Student Management System 1.0. Affected by this vulnerability is an unknown functionality of the file /newsubject.php. The manipulation of the argument sub leads to sql injection. The attack may be initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. | CVSS Score 7.3 (HIGH) ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-14259 A vulnerability was found in Jihai Jshop MiniProgram Mall System 2.9.0. Affected by this issue is so...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[A vulnerability was found in Jihai Jshop MiniProgram Mall System 2.9.0. Affected by this issue is some unknown functionality of the file /index.php/api.html. The manipulation of the argument cat_id results in sql injection. The attack may be launched remotely. The exploit has been made public and could be used. The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way. | CVSS Score 6.3 (MEDIUM) ]]> ]]>

This could lead to local denial of service with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]>

item.title: Pebble tease une nouvelle montre ronde le retour inattendu de la Time Round se précise pour le 9 décembre
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5"> div>Pebble a publié une image mystérieuse annonçant une nouveauté imminente. Tout porte à croire qu'une version modernisée de la Pebble Time Round est dans les tuyaux./div> /div>]]> ]]>]]>

item.title: In-depth tutorials on LLMs, RAGs and real-world AI agent applications.
item.description:
![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[If youaposve been following the latest wave of AI developments, you know the feeling endless tutorials, exciting papers, and a mountain of theoretical concepts. But when you sit down to actually build something, the gap between theory and a working application can feel huge. You need concrete examples...
GitHub Repository https//github.com/patchy631/ai-engineering-hub]]> ]]>]]>]]>

item.title: Ce pack Samsung Galaxy S25 + Chromebook Go est à un super prix chez la Fnac et Darty
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5"> div>Le Samsung Galaxy S25, actuel fleuron de la marque sud-coréenne, se tient actuellement aux côtés d'un laptop Samsung Galaxy Chromebook Go dans un pack dont le prix a considérablement chuté la Fnac et Darty le proposent à 899 euros au lieu de 1 468 euros./div> /div>]]> ]]>]]>]]>]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-59391 A memory disclosure vulnerability exists in libcoap's OSCORE configuration parser in libcoap before ...
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[A memory disclosure vulnerability exists in libcoap's OSCORE configuration parser in libcoap before release-4.3.5-patches. An out-of-bounds read may occur when parsing certain configuration values, allowing an attacker to infer or read memory beyond string boundaries in the .rodata section. This could potentially lead to information disclosure or denial of service. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: SEA (Seattle) on 2025-12-08
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[strong>THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec var data-var='date'>8/var>, var data-var='time'>1700/var> - var data-var='time'>1900/var> UTC/strong>small>Dec var data-var='date'> 8/var>, var data-var='time'>1618/var> UTC/small>strong>Update/strong> - We will be performing scheduled maintenance in SEA (Seattle) datacenter on 2025-12-08 between 1700 and 1900 UTC.br />br />Traffic might be re-routed from this location, hence there is a possibility of a slight increase in latency during this maintenance window for end-users in the affected region. For PNI / CNI customers connecting with us in this location, please make sure you are expecting this traffic to fail over elsewhere during this maintenance window as network interfaces in this datacentre may become temporarily unavailable.br />br />You can now subscribe to these notifications via Cloudflare dashboard and receive these updates directly via email, PagerDuty and webhooks (based on your plan) https//developers.cloudflare.com/notifications/notification-available/#cloudflare-status.small>Dec var data-var='date'> 8/var>, var data-var='time'>1616/var> UTC/small>strong>Scheduled/strong> - We will be performing scheduled maintenance in SEA (Seattle) datacenter on 2025-12-08 between 1630 and 1830 UTC.br />br />Traffic might be re-routed from this location, hence there is a possibility of a slight increase in latency during this maintenance window for end-users in the affected region. For PNI / CNI customers connecting with us in this location, please make sure you are expecting this traffic to fail over elsewhere during this maintenance window as network interfaces in this datacentre may become temporarily unavailable.br />br />You can now subscribe to these notifications via Cloudflare dashboard and receive these updates directly via email, PagerDuty and webhooks (based on your plan) https//developers.cloudflare.com/notifications/notification-available/#cloudflare-status.]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]> ]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-42616 Some endpoints in vulnerability-lookup that modified application state (e.g. changing database entr...
item.description:
![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Some endpoints in vulnerability-lookup that modified application state (e.g. changing database entries, user data, configurations, or other privileged actions) may have been accessible via HTTP GET requests without requiring a CSRF token. This flaw leaves the application vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) attacks an attacker who tricks a logged-in user into visiting a malicious website could cause the user’s browser to issue GET requests that perform unintended state-changing operations in the context of their authenticated session.
Because the server would treat these GET requests as valid (since no CSRF protection or POST method enforcement was in place), the attacker could exploit this to escalate privileges, change settings, or carry out other unauthorized actions without needing the user’s explicit consent or awareness. The fix ensures that all state-changing endpoints now require HTTP POST requests and include a valid CSRF token. This enforces that state changes cannot be triggered by arbitrary cross-site GET requests. This issue affects Vulnerability-Lookup before 2.18.0. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>

item.title: CVE-2025-42620 In affected versions, vulnerability-lookup handled user-controlled content in comments and bundles ...
item.description:
![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[In affected versions, vulnerability-lookup handled user-controlled content in comments and bundles in an unsafe way, which could lead to stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).
On the backend, the related_vulnerabilities field of bundles accepted arbitrary strings without format validation or proper sanitization. On the frontend, comment and bundle descriptions were converted from Markdown to HTML and then injected directly into the DOM using string templates and innerHTML. This combination allowed an attacker who could create or edit comments or bundles to store crafted HTML/JavaScript payloads which would later be rendered and executed in the browser of any user visiting the affected profile page (user.html).
This issue affects Vulnerability-Lookup before 2.18.0. | Severity UNKNOWN ]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>

item.title: Voici la meilleure façon d’utiliser Google Agenda sur Windows 11
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5"> div>Astral permet aux utilisateurs sur Windows d'avoir accès à une application native pour gérer leur Google Agenda. Avec sa nouvelle version, l'application prend en charge le multicomptes et dévoile des options de visioconférences. /div> /div>]]> ]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>

item.title: Rachat de Warner Bros. Netflix assure que « rien ne change »… pour l’instant
item.category: Rachat de Warner Bros par Netflix

item.title: N’utilisez plus ce vélo électrique vendu par Decathlon et Nature Découvertes un défaut le rend dangereux, un rappel est en cours
item.description: ![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5"> div>AddBike lance une campagne de rappel visant l’ensemble des vélos cargo U-Cargo équipés d’une fourche rigide, commercialisés en France depuis 2020. Cette procédure fait suite à la détection d’un possible défaut de fabrication au niveau du cintrage des fourreaux de fourche, susceptible d’entraîner un risque de blessure pour l’utilisateur./div> /div>]]> ]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>]]>

item.title: Quelle Playstation choisir en 2025 PS5 Slim ou pS5 Pro ? On vous aide à trancher
